name: dio_stat
purpose: Gets stat information about the file descriptor fd

return.description:
Returns an associative array with the following keys:
   
    
     
      "device" - device"inode" - inode"mode" - mode"nlink" - number of hard links"uid" - user id"gid" - group id"device_type" - device type (if inode device)"size" - total size in bytes"blocksize" - blocksize"blocks" - number of blocks allocated"atime" - time of last access"mtime" - time of last modification"ctime" - time of last changedio_statNULL
